title: How to Make Genoa Cake

steps.headline: Cream the butter or margarine with the sugar and salt.
Add the eggs one by one, slowly mixing in.
Stir in the flour lightly and add the baking powder.
Add the fruit and combine well.
steps.description: Add the lemon essence if wished.

steps.headline: Pour into a pre-greased or lined cake pan.
steps.description: Cover the top with the almond halves.

steps.headline: Bake in a cool oven, 110 - 140ºC | 225 - 275ºF | Gas 1/4 - 1.
Remove when it is lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
Cool in a wire cooling rack.

text: Cream the butter or margarine with the sugar and salt.  Add the eggs one by one, slowly mixing in.  Stir in the flour lightly and add the baking powder.  Add the fruit and combine well. Add the lemon essence if wished. Pour into a pre-greased or lined cake pan. Cover the top with the almond halves. Bake in a cool oven, 110 - 140ºC | 225 - 275ºF | Gas 1/4 - 1.  Remove when it is lightly browned, about 30 minutes.  Cool in a wire cooling rack.
